page.title: 02TATTING
page.content: I go with Stanley White who lives next door but one. It's fun really because you earn yourself a bit of money. We go in a big van to different areas. we have to knock on the door and ask for old newspapers, scrap metal or jumble. We then get back into the van and do another street. we do so many streets and then go home to have our dinner and then go tatting again. When we have finished we go home and help unload the van and Stanley gives us our money, which is about one pound. He keeps his money in his tin box.
